original_text: who, by the power that enables him to bring everything under his control, will transform our lowly bodies so that they will be like his glorious body.
korean_text: 그는 만물을 자기에게 복종하게 하실 수 있는 자의 역사로 우리의 낮은 몸을 자기 영광의 몸의 형체와 같이 변하게 하시리라

sentences.original_text: who, by the power that enables him
to bring everything under his control,
so that they will be like his glorious body.
